headline: Jefferies’ Bullish Rating on Vistra (VST) Bolstered by Multiple Growth Drivers
summary: On May 16, Julien Dumoulin Smith from Jefferies commended Vistra Corp.’s (NYSE:VST) recent strategic decisions, underpinning his Buy rating on the shares. The analyst believes the company’s efforts to purchase the eastern portfolio of natural gas plants could be substantially positive because these assets would significantly raise its operational capacity.
